## BitcoinsMoneyp.closeVault() method

Close existing Vault by repaying all debt and withdrawing all collateral.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
closeVault(overrides?: BitcoinsTransactionOverrides): Promise<VaultClosureDetails>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  overrides | [BitcoinsTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.bitcoinstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[VaultClosureDetails](./lib-base.vaultclosuredetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [BitcoinsTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers.bitcoinstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.
